did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: This collection consists of publications, in born digital format, from the Academy of Management. Includes individual files each issue of several different publications. Files may in in pdf format or Microsoft doc format. For publications in paper format see Collection 5289 PUBS.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Includes issues for AoM News, Current BPS, Footnotes, GDO Newsletter, HR Division Newsletter, IJTD Newsletter, IMD News, MOC Newsletter, News Blast, ODC Newsletter, Pespectives, RMD Newsletter, SIM Newsletter, and TIM List Serve.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: AoM Publications (digital) #5289 PUBS(d). Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
